mapper.sql: t_user.id as t_user_id, t_user.user_name as t_user_user_name, t_user.nike_name as t_user_nike_name, t_user.head_img as t_user_head_img, t_user.email as t_user_email, t_user.phone as t_user_phone, t_user.age as t_user_age, t_user.gender as t_user_gender, t_user.`password` as `t_user_password`, t_user.created as t_user_created, t_user.updated as t_user_updated
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_name, nike_name, head_img, email, phone, age, gender, `password`, created, updated) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nikeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_user
user_name,
nike_name,
head_img,
email,
phone,
age,
gender,
`password`,
created,
updated,

mapper.update:
update t_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nike_name = #{nikeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nike_name = #{nikeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from t_user where user_name = #{loginName} or email =#{loginName} or phone=#{loginName}
